pages.title: Blood
pages.text: Blood is a resource that you will have a lot of. It is obtained by bleeding carcasses/corpses whilst having a $(l:butchery:blocks/blood_grate)Blood Grate$() beneath to collect the blood. Blood can be removed from the grate with either a bucket or a bottle. Bottled blood can be used in $(l:butchery:blocks/meat_grinder)Meat Grinder$() recipes to obtain blood sausages.
